description.en: Given three ints, return true if one is at least 10 less than one of the others.
description.ru: Даны три целых. Верните true, если одно на 10 или более меньше другого.
description.uz: Uchta butun son berilgan. Agar biri boshqasidan 10 yoki undan ko‘p kichik bo‘lsa true qaytaring.

solution: function lessBy10(a, b, c) { return Math.abs(a - b) >= 10 || Math.abs(a - c) >= 10 || Math.abs(b - c) >= 10; }
